mapper.sql:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM ${parts} WHERE
${select} LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%')
nm LIKE '%%' OR brand LIKE '%%'
LIMIT ${startIdx}, ${rowCnt}) AS t
ORDER BY ${type} ORDER BY ${type} DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_product_gpu (nm, performance, seq, brand, is_inner_gpu) VALUES (#{nm}, ${performance}, ${seq}, #{brand}, #{is_inner_gpu})
INSERT INTO t_product_cpu (nm, performance, inner_gpu, seq, brand) VALUES (#{nm}, ${performance}, ${inner_gpu}, ${seq}, #{brand})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM t_product_gpu ORDER BY seq DESC, brand
SELECT * FROM t_product_gpu WHERE is_inner_gpu = 'N' ORDER BY seq DESC, brand
SELECT * FROM t_product_gpu WHERE is_inner_gpu = 'Y' ORDER BY seq DESC, brand
SELECT B.nm AS gpuNm, igpu FROM t_product_cpu A INNER JOIN t_product_gpu B ON A.inner_gpu = B.igpu WHERE icpu = ${icpu}
SELECT * FROM t_product_cpu ORDER BY seq DESC, brand

SELECT A.nm AS cpuNm, A.performance, B.nm AS gpuNm, A.seq, A.brand FROM t_product_cpu A INNER JOIN t_product_gpu B ON A.inner_gpu = B.igpu WHERE
A.${select} LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%')
A.nm LIKE '%%' OR A.brand LIKE '%%'
ORDER BY A.${type} ORDER BY A.${type} DESC
LIMIT ${startIdx}, ${rowCnt}
